A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A grand experience. \"The Last Jedi\" broke new ground and soared to new heights in the Star Wars saga. This wasn't your average sci-fi flick and for that I applaud it. Director Rian Johnson (Looper and Breaking Bad) also threw in his own creative spark. Plus\, superb performances from both Mark Hamill and the late Carrie Fisher. \"The Last Jedi\" advanced the universe and blurred the lines between good and evil. This is a movie that will emotionally shake you to your fanhood core. For that\, job well done.
